title: His Absolute Authority (Jessika's Love Story: The Billionaire's Continuum, #3)
description: I married a billionaire and now I need to deal with the consequences...From USA Today Bestselling Author Cerys du Lys ~When the media decided to attack my marriage, they made one grave mistake. They thought I was weak, that I couldn't handle the pressure, that the love Asher and I had for one another wasn't strong enough to weather their clouded storm of scandal and malicious rumor.They were wrong.Yes, everyone has doubts. If we didn't, we wouldn't be normal. I'm not a trophy wife, though. Powerful men don't just want strong women beside them; they need them. I am Asher's other half, and he is mine. I'm going to show the world exactly what that means.Just about a year ago, Asher and I took a vow: to love, honor, and cherish for the rest of our lives.Neither of us was lying. I never break my promises. I'm not weak. I refuse to give up without a fight.I know it won't be easy. With the media constantly hounding us at every turn and the police force showing signs of corruption, Asher and I are at a serious disadvantage. I'm at a crossroad in my life, with one path leading towards ruin and the other towards happiness, children, a family, love...I am Jessika Landseer, I am worthy of respect, and this is my story.(This alluring steamy contemporary romantic suspense novel contains themes of domination and submission)
author: Cerys du Lys
